channel.title: PI minigame npc spawning system
channel.description: So im going to make a minigame which waves are used, (wave 1, wave 2, etc.) and for spawning the npcs, would it be a good idea to use an array for spawning the npcs? Or a different method? And i should also make a new folder in the minigames folder for this correct? Thats just another thing i wanted to clear up..
